greet: Hi, please tell me what to `quasi`!
channel_topic:
This bot runs quasicode https://github.com/witling/quasicode. Just type $run and pass some valid quasicode or link to source code afterwards.

Find the bots source code at https://github.com/witling/cm
help:
**commands**
- run: execute a quasicode program. accepts an url, markdown code blocks \` or \```
- help: displays this message
buggy_code_given: Your input was not a valid quasicode - quasi invalid.
